body: [](https://i.imgflip.com/ycc6p.jpg) Hi Alemeh, Mostapha is right, you need to simplify it a bit. I'm watching the tutorials and recommend to check them out, they help a lot. Specifically about your problem: [one](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=TpqzxnuwhAs&list=PLruLh1AdY-SgW4uDtNSMLeiUmA8YXEHT_&index=13), [two](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Md6LFS6cwc0&list=PLruLh1AdY-SgW4uDtNSMLeiUmA8YXEHT_&index=14) and [three](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=aEC62LY094A&list=PLruLh1AdY-SgW4uDtNSMLeiUmA8YXEHT_&index=15).
